name: "Dead Like Me"- Roxy Quiz | Dead Like Me | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Meter maid.

	Roxy is one of the two Reapers in Rube's crew that has a regular job. Because her tickets are sometimes hotly contested, she has taken to carrying a gun to end arguments quickly. Besides, is a ticket worth getting shot over?

Leg warmers.

	Roxy invented leg warmers by cutting the bottoms out of her white socks and wearing them around her shins. A jealous fellow dancer later strangled Roxy to death with a leg warmer.

questions.text: In life, what did Roxy enjoy doing?
questions.explanation:
Dancing.

	Roxy enjoyed dancing, although she doesn't seem to do much of it in the afterlife. Since one of her fellow dancers killed her, it may be that dancing brings back painful memories.

questions.text: How does Roxy commemorate the anniversary of her death?
questions.correct: Acts nice to everyone and becomes morose
questions.explanation:
Acts nice to everyone and becomes morose.

	When we see Roxy's attitude on the anniversary of her death, she brings everyone a balloon and acts nicely, but she is just not her normal mean self. In a season one episode, Rube helps Roxy let go of the past.

questions.text: Where does Roxy say Ray Summers moved to?
questions.explanation:
Portland.

	Ray Summers was one of Daisy's abusive boyfriends who was killed by Mason. Although Roxy knows that Daisy and Mason had something to do with the disappearance, she covers them by saying that Ray moved to Nevada when Rube asks.

questions.text: According to Mason, what does Roxy eat for breakfast?
questions.explanation:
Puppy dogs.

	Mason tells Roxy why she cannot be cordial: "Because you're an ornery bitch who eats puppy dogs for breakfast." Of course Mason is being sarcastic, Roxy does not actually eat puppies, but her constant bad moods are sometimes depressing.

questions.text: Roxy tries to further her education at the start of the second season. What kind of school does she enter?
questions.explanation:
Police academy.

	After being a meter maid for the first season, Roxy decides she wants to move up in the chain of command and enters a police academy. Because the series was canceled after the second season, we never learn if Roxy becomes a police officer.

questions.text: Which actress in the series plays Roxy?
questions.explanation:
Jasmine Guy.

	Jasmine Guy has also been in "A Different World" and "Cats Don't Dance". She's a mother and teaches dance to underprivileged children, while maintaining a career in television and theatre.

questions.text: Roxy was worshiped by a man who attempted to start a religion around her. What did Roxy do to cause this?
questions.correct: Pulled the man's soul out of his body
options: Told the man she was God
Reaped someone with the man watching
questions.explanation:
Pulled the man's soul out of his body.

	Roxy and the man in question were having an argument about a ticket she gave him. Roxy became so enraged that she pulled the man's soul out of his body and yelled at him! Luckily the resulting religion did not catch on, and Roxy turned the man back into his old self before long. This all happens in the episode "Sunday Mornings".

questions.text: While using the Happy Time workplace, who does Roxy befriend?
questions.explanation:
Crystal.

	Crystal is George's coworker at Happy Time that looks like she stepped out of a Gary Larson cartoon. She sees the Reapers when they use Happy Time's computers to file paperwork and ends up helping them by using her rapid typing skills.
